docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: # Introduction This site hosts autogenerated documentation for Data Hub connectors.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
1. Sign in to Demo CRM and create an API key.

  2. Enable API access under Settings ▸ Integrations.

docs.title: Connector Setup
docs.text:
Below table lists the fields shown in the connector configuration form.

Field Description

| API Key | Token copied from Demo CRM. |

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
Technical Name Type Default Example Description

| api_key | String | | abc123 | API key generated in prerequisites. |

docs.title: Task Parameters
docs.text:
Technical Name Type Default Example Description

| timeout | Integer | 10000 | 15000 | Request timeout in milliseconds. |
